Loot • Trade Goods • Tools - 170 cards\n\nFor campaigns that push the envelope: varied treasures, commercial goods, and every crafter's staple.\n\nContents:\n- 104 loot items : treasures, gems, artifacts, precious objects\n- 27 trade goods : commercial goods, raw materials\n- 37 tools : crafting, lockpicking, alchemy, navigation\n- 2 rule cards : trade and crafting mechanics\n\nAdd variety and tactical choices — from market bartering to treasure discoveries!
